text: François de Candia was a Savoyard nobleman, Vidame, Viscount of Geneva (Latin: Vice Dominus Genevarum) and Captain of the castle on the island of the Rhône in 1377.Annuaire de la noblesse de France (1861), p.377 on line ==Related pages== *House of Candia ==References== Category:Nobility Category:House of Candie
title: François de Candie
